description: This file defines a Flutter widget for the 'Staff' screen in a kindergarten management system. It includes the main `StaffScreen` widget that displays a list of staff members fetched asynchronously, along with functionality to add or delete staff. It also contains a form widget `_StaffForm` for adding new staff members.

classes.name: StaffScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of staff members and provides options to add or delete staff.

classes.name: _StaffForm
classes.description: A form widget for inputting new staff member details.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the `_future` variable to fetch staff data.

methods.name: _reload
methods.description: Reloads the staff list by fetching data again from the repository.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for `StaffScreen`, including a FutureBuilder to display staff list.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the form UI for adding a new staff member.
